required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Investigation of the Effect of Inhibition of CYP3A4/5 by Itraconazole on the PK of CHF6001 (Tanimilast)
clinical_study.official_title: Open-label, Non-randomized, One Sequence Cross-over Study to Investigate the Effect of Inhibition of CYP3A4/5 by Itraconazole on the Pharmacokinetics of CHF6001 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this proposed study is to investigate the pharmacokinetics interaction between CHF6001 as substrate and Itraconazole as inhibitor of CYP3A4/5 in a drug-drug interaction study.

detailed_description.textblock:
This clinical trial is a single centre, single dose Phase I study, with a non-randomized, open label, one sequence cross-over design.
A total of 24 healthy male and female are planned to be included.
Participants will be dosed with CHF6001 before and during co-administration of Itraconazole and will act as their own control. The study will be run with a one-sequence crossover design, where all subjects will be treated with CHF6001 in the first treatment period and CHF6001+Itraconazole in the second treatment period in order to avoid the need of a very long washout from the CYP3A4/5 inhibitor.
Standard safety assessments will be conducted during the Study, including safety blood and urine laboratory tests, vital signs, physical examinations, ECGs and observations of any adverse events. Blood samples will be also collected for PK analysis.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Over 96 hours after administration in blood
Over 96 hours after administration in blood
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUCt) for CHF6001

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Over 96 hours after administration in blood
secondary_outcome.description: Area under plasma concentration from 0 to 96 hours (AUC0-96) for CHF6001, CHF5956 and CHF6095

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Over 96 hours after administration in blood
secondary_outcome.description: Area under curve extrapolated to infinity (AUC0-∞) for CHF6001, CHF5956 and CHF6095

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Over 96 hours after administration in blood
secondary_outcome.description: Time of the maximum plasma concentration (tmax) for CHF6001, CHF5956 and CHF6095

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Over 96 hours after administration in blood
secondary_outcome.description: Terminal half-life (t1/2) for CHF6001, CHF5956 and CHF6095

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Over 96 hours after administration in blood
Over 96 hours after administration in blood
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUCt) for CHF5956 and CHF6095

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Over 96 hours after administration in blood
secondary_outcome.description: Peak Plasma Concentration (Cmax) for CHF5956 and CHF6095

arm_group.description: Single dose of CHF6001 administered after repeated doses of oral Itraconazole
